name: The World in a Bottle
description:
For LD38. You are a child god with a school project: make a world that can sustain life. Experiment to find a combination of materials that will allow life to thrive!

WASD to pan, EQ to zoom. Click on buttons to choose a terrain, then click and drag to 'paint' tiles. Hit Next Phase to start spawning! Can you get all three creatures to spawn and evolve?

Made by Ben G (@karmafarm), Giada Z (@brica6rac), Els W (@elskwhite) and Sam B (@Baronn_Blackmore)
